description.value:
Your fish-like body is not used to the dryness of the surface world. You must submerge in water or otherwise get soaked by 4 pints of water each day or automatically gain 1 level of @Compendium[undertaking.conditions.ERBR3AG01H4N1L91]{Exhaustion} at the end of your next long rest.
This level of exhaustion cannot be removed without submerging in water for at least 1 hour.
